item.title: Keychron Linux Function Keys
item.description: When I bought a Keychron K2 I knew it would work in Windows and Mac, but I use Linux. But it’s just a keyboard… it should work. Well… It works! But on my OS Arch Linux with Gnome had a little problem. The FN keys didn’t work perfectly. Actually the FN keys were for MacOS, not Windows. How I fixed: Use the switch on side of keyboard to change to Windows mode Hold Fn + X + L for 4 seconds to set the key row to Function mode Type in the terminal:
